TEXT.TITLE: PHILIP CROSBY <PCRO.O> MAKES ACQUISITION
TEXT.BODY: Philip Crosby Associates Inc said it has agreed to acquire Process Integrity Inc of Dallas, a computer software designer, for undisclosed terms. It said Process' software helps companies monitor industrial processes, identifies problems and recommends solutions. Reuter
